thread.title: Benefits cheat lied about pulling people from the rubble after 9/11 terror tragedy
thread.title_full: Benefits cheat lied about pulling people from the rubble after 9/11 terror tragedy

title: Benefits cheat lied about pulling people from the rubble after 9/11 terror tragedy
text:
TOWERING STUPIDITY Benefits cheat lied about pulling people from the rubble after 9/11 terror tragedy 
The ex-cruise ship worker - who was caught out lying that she was blind and wheelchair-bound - described battling to free survivors and those who had died Exclusive Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments A BENEFITS cheat caught driving when she said she was blind lied about being a heroine of the 9/11 terror tragedy. 
Convicted fraudster Ann Grigor made a series of astonishing boasts about how she pulled people from the rubble with her bare hands after the twin towers atrocity. Ann Grigor lied about heroics after 9/11 attacks on the US Getty Images 3 Grigor claimed she pulled survivors and bodies from rubble after 9/11 tragedy 
The ex-cruise ship worker – who was caught out lying that she was blind and wheelchair-bound – described battling to free survivors and those who had died when the World Trade Center buildings collapsed. 
She also claimed she comforted bereaved families as they identified their loved ones. 
Grigor wrote on Facebook: “It was like something out of a horror movie.” Most Read in News KIM'S FINAL MINUTES Dramatic CCTV captures shocking moment 'female hit squad spray Kim Jong-nam in the face with poison' before he drops dead URGENT RECALL Morrisons recall peppered beef slices infected with bug over fears they could cause 'flu-like symptoms' 'I'LL TAKE THEM OUT' Were murders that inspired movie Essex Boys revenge for Leah Betts death? Crime boss offered to kill drug dealers just weeks before they were found dead SUNDAY LUNCH BLOODBATH Horror as two kids see their mum stabbed to death by man thought to be their dad in suspected 'murder suicide' race for the LAST GOLDen FIVER Only ONE plastic £5 note with a £50,000 engraving is left as lucky punter finds one in Northern Ireland bar REAL LIFE MRS ROBINSON Sex mad teacher who slept with pupil 'hundreds of times' and sent him seedy selfies is jailed 'PRISON'S KILLING ME' Rolf Harris says he'll be dead within a YEAR as retrial threatens another six years behind bars 'wiping away the horror' Holiday flat where Maddie McCann went missing is closed to 'spooked' holidaymakers TRAIN TRAGEDY Mum of four 'leapt in front of train at packed station after sending final text and handing her bag to stranger' 'I'LL NEVER FORGET YOU' First pictures of man shot dead in his black Mercedes in Sheffield as he drove to a family do leeds with a hook Shocking moment huge brawl erupts among crowd at Elland Road boxing fight as chairs are thrown and a woman is knocked out POLICE PROBE Cops launch hunt after 'fight between woman and three-year-old boy' in Worcester COCK-UP AU VIN Builders cafe with an £8.50 all-you-can-eat buffet wins a Michelin star by mistake UFO SIGHTING? Nasa live feed mysteriously cuts as 'six large UFOs' creep past International Space Station LASHED FOR TAKING A CHARGER Horrific moment man beats girlfriend’s son, 7, with a belt 62 TIMES for ‘stealing phone charger’ FAMILY PLANNING Mum-of-12 who pockets £40,000 a year in benefits flashes her tummy outside medical centre before announcing she’s expecting baby 13 SET YOUR ALARM Here's all you need to know about when and why the clocks change 'IT WAS LIKE A HORROR MOVIE' Human guinea pigs disfigured by infamous 'Elephant Man' drug trial 10 years ago tell of limb-loss horror PEERS IN EU'S POCKET Brexit-bashing Lords receive £500k in EU pensions a year and aren't allowed to criticise Brussels... but won't say so in Brexit debate 
But a former friend said: “It’s just sick. 
“I don’t believe a word she says.” 
Last month the Scottish Sun on Sunday told how Grigor, from Gullane, East Lothian, was prosecuted after faking a string of disabilities. 
The married scammer pocketed £23,000 in disability benefits over a ten-year period. 
But the Department of Work and Pensions launched a probe after being tipped off that she had been on a protest march and made social media posts which cast doubt on her ailments. 
Footage has now emerged of her striding along at a march to protest about the release of Da Vinci rapist Robert Greens in 2012. 
Fraud investigators later watched her driving at 70mph on a dual carriageway and filmed her walking unaided on a shopping trip. 
She was sentenced to community payback and a three-year supervision order at Edinburgh Sheriff Court last year after admitting receiving an overpayment of £17,000. 
Bleating Grigor later whined: “Your story was nothing but lies. 
“I have been sick for years.” 
But it can be revealed that Grigor also claims she worked alongside heroic firefighters, police officers and medics after the terrorist attacks in New York in September 2001. 
She claims she undertook gruelling rescue work after terrorists flew passenger planes into the Twin Towers. Conspiracists believe this video proves that 9/11 was a controlled explosion 
Grigor wrote on Facebook on the anniversary of 9/11: “I know I will NEVER forget that day. 
“I was working in the building across the street and the screams of people trying to run and get out of danger. 
“The smoke, the black stuff falling from the sky and the smell was horrible! 
“I can still to this day smell it as I think of it all over again! 
“I’m sitting here today miles away but my heart and thoughts are in New York City. 
“I remember digging in the rubble with bare hands trying to find bodies and free people! 
“It was like something out of a horror movie. 
“All services were called on to help, the policemen, the firemen, medics, the Salvation Army. 
“Churches became chapels of rest for the dead people until a family member came to identify them. 
“There was not enough places to lay the bodies out. 
“It was heartbreaking as sometimes you were pulling out body parts rather than a complete body. 
“It was not a pretty sight. 
“We were praying with families as they named their family member.” 3 She was also caught driving while claiming to be blind 
Many families who lost loved ones in the New York attacks were only reunited with fragments of them identified through DNA. 
A source said: “Everyone knows Ann is in a world of make-believe but this really takes the biscuit.” 
Last night when pressed about the bizarre tragedy claims Grigor admitted she made them up. 
She told our reporter: “They’re not true. 
“I know people that were involved in it.”
